welcome.title: Welcome to the Documentation
welcome.description: Create and organize your documentation with our powerful editor.
welcome.instruction: Select a document from the sidebar or create a new one to get started.

feature.rich_editor_desc: Fully-featured editor with formatting, images, and more
feature.structure_desc: Create folders and pages in a hierarchical structure
feature.autosave_desc: Never lose your work with automatic saving

tree.no_docs_help: Create your first folder or page to get started.

editor.error_title_length: Title must be less than 255 characters long
editor.no_content_help: Click the Edit button to start writing.
editor.sort_order_help: Lower numbers appear first in the navigation
editor.password_help: Set a password to restrict access to this document
editor.excerpt_error: Excerpt must be less than 500 characters long
editor.excerpt_help: Optional summary displayed in search results and lists
editor.not_found_message: The requested document could not be loaded.
